mapper.select: select itemNo, usersNo, category, title, info, ea, to_char(cost, '999,999,999') stringcost, path from item where views = 1
select itemNo, usersNo, category, title, info, ea, to_char(cost, '999,999,999') stringcost, path from item where views = 1 and category = #{category}
select itemNo, usersNo, category, title, info, ea, to_char(cost, '999,999,999') stringcost, path from item where itemNo = #{itemNo}

select h.historyNo, h.usersNo, h.historytitle as title, h.historyhp as hp, to_char(h.historycost, '999,999,999') as stringcost, to_char(h.historydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as itemdate, h.historystatus as status, h.historyea as ea, i.path from itemhistory h, item i where h.itemNo = i.itemNo and h.usersNo = #{usersNo}
select itemNo, usersNo, category, title, info, ea, cost, path, views from item where usersNo = #{usersNo}
